      • consecutiveMove

        public boolean consecutiveMove(int i,
                               int j)
        Checks if the attempted move is being done 1 unit to the left, right, up or down. If not, the move is not allowed.
        Parameters:
        i - Collumn.
        j - Line.
        Returns:
        True if move is allowed.

      • hasMatch

        public boolean hasMatch(int x,
                        int y,
                        java.lang.String texture)
        Checks if the attempted move causes any matches. If not, the move is not allowed.
        Parameters:
        x - Collumn.
        y - Line.
        texture - Texture that falls into that place if the move is done.
        Returns:
        True if move causes any matches which means it is allowed.

      • isMatch

        boolean isMatch(int x1,
                int y1,
                int x2,
                int y2,
                java.lang.String texture)
        Checks if the attempted move causes a match.
        Parameters:
        x1 - Collumn.
        y1 - Line.
        x2 - Collumn.
        y2 - Line.
        texture - Texture that falls into that place if the move is done.
        Returns:
